price: 6. puisé à une source dont boiront les serviteurs d’Allah et qu’ils feront jaillir comme ils le voudront.
arabic: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِيرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ʿaynan yashrabu bihā ʿibādu al-lahi yufajjirūnahā tafjīran
